Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableByClient, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameExpert
public class Game extends Object implements ObservableByClient, Serializable
Main class of the GameModel. This class acts as a hotpoint for the classes below it, that deal with board pieces and pawns. It's also the interface to which the controller communicates and calls methods. Finally, it coordinates game actions between the main components of the Model: the Clouds, the Bag and the Coin Bag; the ProfessorSet storing Professors; the Archipelago storing islands and Mother nature; the Players owning a board and a deck; the CharacterManager storing and activating Characters; the TurnManager that decides the turn order and the current player.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(GameConfig gameConfig)
      Constructor for Game. Places 10 students across the Archipelago, fills the bag with the remaining students, then sets up the number and size of clouds and of players. Finally, adds the Players to the TurnManager.
      Parameters:
      gameConfig - the game configuration object, created by the GameFactory

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer(String nickname, TowerColor towerColor) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new player in the current game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the player. Assumed unique.
      towerColor - The team chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when team selected is already full.

    • assignWizard

      public void assignWizard(String nickname, WizardType wizardType) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method that assigns a chosen Wizard and their deck to a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who will own the deck
      wizardType - the type of the wizard
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the wizard has already been chosen in this game

    • determineFirstRoundOrder

      public void determineFirstRoundOrder()
      Method that determines the planning order of the very first round, and actually starts the game (game phase goes from idle to planning)

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(String nickname, int assistantID) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException, LastRoundException
      Method that retrieves the played AssistantCard by its ID and passes its turn order to TurnManager. It also checks if a Player is "desperate", that is, if they can only play Assistants that have already been played by someone else.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the Player who is playing their Assistant
      assistantID - the ID of the AssistantCard chosen
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a player is not "desperate" and chooses an Assistant card already chosen by someone else
      NoSuchElementException
      LastRoundException

    • checkDesperate

      public boolean checkDesperate(String nickname)
      Method that checks if a certain Player is "desperate", that is, if they can only play Assistants that have already been played by someone else.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the Player to check
      Returns:
      true if the Player is "desperate", false otherwise

    • moveStudentFromEntrance

      public void moveStudentFromEntrance(String nickname, int studentID, int containerID) throws FullTableException
      Method for moving a student from the player's entrance to the dining room or to an island. It checks if the student is actually inside the entrance, if the destination is a dining room table, or if it is an island tile.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the entrance's owner
      studentID - the ID of the entrance student to move
      containerID - the ID of the student container which will host the student
      Throws:
      FullTableException

    • checkAndMoveProfessor

      public void checkAndMoveProfessor(PlayerList players, Color color)
      Method that checks if any Player has gained the right to host the Professor of the given color by moving students into their dining room.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players inside the game
      color - the color of the Professor to check

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(String nickname, int islandTileID) throws IllegalArgumentException, GameOverException
      Method that moves mother nature on the chosen island, provided the current player's assistant card has a move power equal or greater than the number of hops required for mother nature to land on that island tile. Should throw an exception
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the Player that is moving Mother Nature
      islandTileID - the ID of the IslandTile where the player wants to place Mother Nature
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      GameOverException

    • resolveIslandGroup

      public void resolveIslandGroup(int islandGroupID) throws GameOverException
      Method that "resolves" an island group, that is, it determines what player has the most influence on that group, places one (or more) of that player's towers on the group if necessary and finally checks if a merge is possible with the groups on the right or left of that group.
      Parameters:
      islandGroupID - the group to resolve
      Throws:
      GameOverException - if the total number of groups in the archipelago at the end of the process is 3 (or less)

    • takeFromCloud

      public void takeFromCloud(String nickname, int cloudID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Method to take all students from a CloudTile and place them in the current player's entrance. If the cloud in question is not selectable because it has already been picked or because this is the last round and the bag is empty nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who is taking the students from the cloud
      cloudID - the ID of the cloud that the player chose
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException

    • determinePlanningOrder

      public void determinePlanningOrder()
      Method that is called by the controller and that is forwarded to TurnManager. It determines the order in which players will play their planning phase.

    • determineActionOrder

      public void determineActionOrder()
      Method that is called by the controller and that is forwarded to TurnManager. It determines * the order in which players will play their action phase, using cardsPlayedThisRound.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws IllegalStateException
      This method progresses the turn, updating currentPlayer.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      This method progresses the phase, going from planning to action and vice-versa.

    • pushThisRoundInLastRound

      public void pushThisRoundInLastRound()
      Method that moves the Assistant cards played this round into their respective discard pile.

    • refillClouds

      public void refillClouds() throws LastRoundException
      Throws:
      LastRoundException

    • disableClouds

      public void disableClouds()
      Method that should be called by the controller when it catches a LastRoundException. In fact during the last round it is not possible to draw from CloudTiles.

    • setLastRound

      public void setLastRound()
      Method that should be called by the controller when it catches a LastRoundException.

    • endOfRoundOperations

      public void endOfRoundOperations() throws GameOverException
      Method that performs operation each end of round (= when the last player has played his ActionPhase turn). It removes the cards played this round then checks if it's the last round.
      Throws:
      GameOverException - if it is the last round

    • determineWinner

      public TowerColor determineWinner()
      Determines the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      The TowerColor of the winning team, NEUTRAL if the game ended on a tie.

    • getCardsPlayedThisRound

      public LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> getCardsPlayedThisRound()
      Method used to observe cards played this round. Returned according to current order (planning or action). To return them ordered, it uses the currentOrder given by TurnManager. If no order has been established yet, it will return an empty LinkedHashMap.
      Specified by:
      getCardsPlayedThisRound in interface ObservableByClient
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashMap containing the nickname of the Player and the ID of the card played.
